name: Quirky Roadblocks!
description:
Made for LD31 game jam

Rate it here :)

CONTROLS:

Mouse to click on vehicle to select

WASD to move selected vehicle

Objective:

Set up an efficient roadblock as quickly as possible!

It's basically a police chase.

No you're not the runner.

Nope, not the chasing cop.

Instead, you're the roadblock unit!
